name: 霍弘毅
objective: 文化研究以文學，社會批評，通俗文化，人類學、科學、女性主義和種族批評等觀點，對文化現象做深入的觀察、思考、及批判。本課程著重應用文化研究之豐碩成果，啟發學生認識文化問題，並培養其觀察，思考，及批判能力。不僅能因之促成社會進步，更重要的是能藉由對本國及異國文化差異及價值觀的深入瞭解，將知識應用在跨文化溝通上，協助本國企業成功地國際化。
schedule:
Cross-Cultural Communication
Spring 2009

Description

In this course we will look at ways in which the West (America, Gr. Britain, and France) imagines the East (Persia, China, India, Vietnam, Japan) or the way in which the West represents the East to itself, and thus the course is as much a course in cultural miscommunication as it is in cultural communication.  The course will be a study in reality, illusion, fantasy, and ideology.
